description_html:
The Remedy two person Japanese soaking tub is fabricated with reclining buckets seats and innovative draining channels to allow for drainage. The contemporary style gives the modern look in any room while giving the bather a true deep soaking experience.
-Custom overflow
-6 whirlpool jet system
-Contemporary Bowed Ledge
-Custom Nickel or Copper Patina Finish Available
-Fully customizable
